thread.title: Purchases from Cocoweb.com Are Now Insured by Google
thread.title_full: Purchases from Cocoweb.com Are Now Insured by Google

author: Bryan Hernandez
title: Purchases from Cocoweb.com Are Now Insured by Google
text:
Cocoweb.com, which offers high-end LED, picture lights, piano lamps and barn lights, was recently selected to join the Google Trusted Stores program. To help shoppers identify online merchants that offer a great shopping experience, the Google Trusted Store badge is awarded to e-commerce sites that demonstrate a track record of on-time shipping and excellent customer service. When visiting Cocoweb.com, shoppers will see a Google Trusted Store badge and can click on it for more information. Cocoweb.com is excited to be awarded the Google Trusted Store badge and will continue to provide excellent service and products for our appreciated customers.
As an added benefit, when a shopper makes a purchase at a Google Trusted Store, they have the option to select free purchase protection from Google. Then in the unlikely event of an issue with their purchase, they can request Googleâ€™s help, and Google will work with the customer and Cocoweb.com to address the issue. As part of this, Google offers up to $1,000 lifetime purchase protection for free.
Cocoweb.com provides high-value lights with the newest LED technology widely known for their long lifetime, energy efficiency, durable quality, and zero UV emissions in comparison to other lighting sources.
Cocoweb.com Inc. is headquartered in Irvine, California where our team works hard to cater to all individual customer needs. With over 50 years of experience, we have been able to serve our clientele base who consists of high-profile customers and high-end hospitality establishments such as the MGM Grand in Las Vegas, a variety of Hyatt hotels, Island Hotel located in Newport Beach, and many more.
